approval_mode.description: Approval mode for the appointment, if applicable

auto_follow_up_hours.description: Number of hours after which an automatic follow-up occurs

category_name.description: Category of the appointment, if applicable

charge_type.description: Type of charge associated with the appointment

client_color_id.description: ID representing the client's color preference or tag

conversation_id.description: Unique identifier of the conversation related to this appointment

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the appointment was created

currency.description: Currency used for the appointment pricing

duration.description: Duration of the appointment in minutes

end_time.description: Timestamp indicating when the appointment ends

follow_up_data.description: Additional data for follow-ups, if any

follow_up_time.description: Timestamp for the follow-up, if applicable

follow_up_type.description: Type of follow-up (e.g., email, phone, in-person)

future_bookings_limit.description: Limit for future bookings related to this appointment

image_url.description: URL to an image associated with the appointment

interaction_details.description: Details regarding the interaction for the appointment

interaction_type.description: Type of interaction for the appointment

invoices.description: List of invoices associated with the appointment

is_recurring.description: Indicates whether the appointment is recurring

last_action_message.description: Message associated with the last action taken

linked_booking_uid.description: UID of a linked booking, if applicable

meeting_reminder_sms_1.description: Indicates whether the first SMS reminder is enabled

meeting_reminder_sms_2.description: Indicates whether the second SMS reminder is enabled

min_hours_before_meeting.description: Minimum number of hours before the meeting can be booked

no_show.description: Indicates whether the client did not show up

optional_times.description: Array of optional times available for rescheduling

payment_id.description: Identifier for the payment, if applicable

remind_before_in_hours_1.description: Hours before appointment for the first reminder

remind_before_in_hours_2.description: Hours before appointment for the second reminder

series_id.description: ID of the series if this appointment is part of one

series_instance_count.description: Number of instances in the appointment series

service_id.description: Identifier of the service associated with the appointment

source_data.description: Source data indicating how the appointment was initiated

staff_display_name.description: Name of the staff member handling the appointment

staff_id.description: Unique identifier of the staff member

staff_image.description: Image URL of the staff member

start_time.description: Timestamp of when the appointment starts

zoom_start_url.description: URL for the Zoom meeting, if applicable

description: Represents a scheduled appointment, including timing, participants, pricing, and state.
